Title: Relates to permitting security guards and private investigators licensed to possess or carry a firearm to possess and carry such firearm in New York City
Summary: Permits security guards and private investigators licensed to possess or carry a firearm to possess and carry such firearm in New York City without a special permit from the police commissioner of the city of New York granting validity to such license.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to permitting security guards and private investigators licensed to possess or carry a firearm to possess and carry such firearm in New York City without obtaining a special permit from the police commissioner of the city of New York
